desc: We specialise in Wedding Dress / Bridal Alterations, all types of Clothing Alterations for both Women & Men, and Tailoring (Dressmaking) made-to-measure dresses for any occasion. Established in Mosman, Sydney since 1995, we provide the highest quality and professional clothing alteration services at affordable prices.

layout.text: Specialists in all types of tailoring & alterations
From Wedding Dress / Bridal Alterations, to all types of Clothing Alterations for both Men & Women, to tailoring made-to-measure dresses for any special occasion.
